title: Groupthink
notes: SteamDB lists 11 reviews and Shared/Split Screen categories; steamapp.net says players join through a browser on computer or mobile and must see the Groupthink window. Play mode inferred from description.
raw_comment: Party game where a team comes up with an answer by submitting a letter one person at a time. 3-16 local players. Browser on phones, tablets, etc as controllers. Shared screen.
